CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Farms relative to Whispering Willows Estate?
SRP.A: Sunstone Farms is {below} Whispering Willows Estate in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sunstone Farms relative to Ironwood Ranch?
SRP.A: Sunstone Farms is {below} Ironwood Ranch in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Ironwood Ranch relative to Whispering Willows Estate?
SRP.A: Ironwood Ranch is {below} Whispering Willows Estate in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Ironwood Ranch}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total crop yield?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Sunstone Farms}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Whispering Willows Estate's minimum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Whispering Willows Estate's minimum Crop Yield is in {2000}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Ironwood Ranch's maximum Crop Yield in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Ironwood Ranch's maximum Crop Yield is in {2022}.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2004, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2005 and 2009?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 2002 and 2004 was {lower} than between 2005 and 2009.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 2019 higher or lower than in 2022?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 2019 was {lower} than in 2022.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2020, was the average total Crop Yield higher or lower than between 2000 and 2019?
NC.A: The average total crop yield between 1999 and 2020 was {higher} than between 2000 and 2019.

NC.Q: Was the total Crop Yield in 2000 higher or lower than in 2011?
NC.A: The total crop yield in 2000 was {lower} than in 2011.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Ironwood Ranch} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Ironwood Ranch and Whispering Willows Estate first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Ironwood Ranch and Whispering Willows Estate first exchanged leading positions in {2000}.
